description: This file defines an Angular component named 'FormContainerComponent'. The component serves as a reusable, styled container for forms or modal-like flows such as authentication, with projected content for form fields and buttons. It applies theme variables and styles defined in associated CSS files.

classes.name: FormContainerComponent
classes.description: An Angular component providing a styled, reusable container for form content and modal flows, applying theme styles and hosting projected content.

methods.name: hostClass
methods.description: A class binding that attaches the 'form-container-root' class to the host element for styling and theming.
